Package polyglot.ast

Interface ClassDecl

All Superinterfaces:
ClassMember, java.lang.Cloneable, Copy<Node>, Documentable, Node, NodeOps, java.io.Serializable, Term, TopLevelDecl
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassDecl_c
public interface ClassDecl
extends TopLevelDecl, ClassMember
A ClassDecl represents a top-level, member, or local class declaration.
